ios.screen_identified: Home screen of a smart home app, showing disconnected status, quick actions, active scenes, occupied rooms and bottom navigation bar.
ios.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

assertions_checked.details: The 'Emergency' quick action button is visible.

elements_found: Bottom navigation bar (Home, Rooms, Scenes, Settings)

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functional.
score_justifications.accessibility: All elements have good contrast and appropriate touch targets.
score_justifications.visual: The layout is clean, consistent with iOS conventions, and visually appealing.

ios.summary: The screen is well-designed, meets the requirements of the phase, and adheres to iOS platform conventions.

ipad.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functioning. The error message does not detract from this since it is a momentary state.
score_justifications.accessibility: Good contrast and touch target sizes.
score_justifications.visual: Overall, the screen is well-designed. Minor improvement could be made to reduce visual clutter.

conventions_followed: Uses tab navigation at the top

ipad.summary: The emergency visible screen is displayed correctly on iPadOS, with all expected elements present and visible. A connection error is displaying but the primary elements are still accessible.
recommendations: Consider displaying a loading indicator when there is a connection error.

android.screen_identified: Home screen of the Kagami app
android.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

assertions_checked.details: 'Emergency' is visible as part of the 'Quick Actions' section.
The app branding 'Kagami' is visible in the top left corner.

elements_found: Quick Actions (Emergency, Lights On, Lights Off, Open, Close)

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functioning as expected.
score_justifications.accessibility: The screen has good contrast and touch targets are appropriate. There is potential for further improvement by providing ARIA labels for UI elements.
score_justifications.visual: The UI follows Android Material Design conventions with a clean layout and clear hierarchy. Minor improvements could include standardized spacing.

android.summary: The screen meets the requirements for Phase 1 of the Emergency Safety journey. All primary elements including the emergency action button and app branding are visible. The UI is well-designed and mostly compliant with Android Material Design conventions.

wearos.screen_identified: Emergency Visible screen, displaying time, user name, a button to activate goodnight mode, and an emergency button.
wearos.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and visible.
score_justifications.accessibility: All text is readable and there are no apparent accessibility issues.
score_justifications.visual: The layout is clean and follows platform conventions.

wearos.summary: The Emergency Visible screen is correctly displayed, with all required elements present and adhering to platform conventions.

watchos.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

assertions_checked.details: The 'Emergency' text is visible in the quick actions section.
The text 'Kagami' is visible at the top.

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and visible.
score_justifications.accessibility: No accessibility issues detected. Contrast and touch targets are good.
score_justifications.visual: The UI follows platform conventions and presents a clear hierarchy.

watchos.summary: The Emergency Visible screen appears correctly on watchOS with all required elements and following platform conventions.

tvos.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functional.
score_justifications.accessibility: The screen elements are readable and follow accessibility standards.
score_justifications.visual: The layout is clean, well-organized, and visually appealing.

tvos.summary: The Emergency Safety Emergency Visible screen meets all requirements and displays the necessary elements correctly.

visionos.screen_identified: Home screen with Kagami control panel overlay
visionos.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

assertions_checked.details: 'Emergency' is visible in the top section of the control panel.
The text 'Kagami' is visible as the title of the control panel.

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functioning as expected.
score_justifications.accessibility: Text is readable and elements are tappable with appropriate spacing. Likely WCAG AA compliant.
score_justifications.visual: The screen is well-designed, follows platform conventions, and has a clear visual hierarchy.

visionos.summary: The Emergency Safety Visible screen is correctly displayed with all necessary elements visible and adhering to platform conventions.

desktop.expected_screen: Emergency Visible screen for Emergency Safety

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functioning as expected.
score_justifications.accessibility: The elements appear to be accessible with good contrast.
score_justifications.visual: The screen is well-organized and follows platform conventions.

desktop.summary: All required elements are visible and the screen is well-organized.
